effect.scarlet_violet: User and target switch abilities. Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers. If either Pokémon has multitype or wonder guard, this move will fail.

effect.legends_za: User and target switch abilities. Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers. If either Pokémon has multitype or wonder guard, this move will fail.

flavor_text.scarlet_violet: The user employs its psychic power to exchange Abilities with the target.
